definition: just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
too bad/unfortunately/as luck would have it

sentences.english: We may call this phenomenon catching the lion by its tail, and it is an unskillful thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以称之为抓住狮子的尾巴，这是不善巧的。

sentences.english: They still rely on this principle today, incidentally.
sentences.chinese: 巧的是今天苹果依然遵循这个原则。

sentences.english: I glimpsed the dancer balancing herself on the ambulance by become.
sentences.chinese: 我掽巧瞥见舞蹈者在捄护车上使自己保持平衡。
荆浩对“巧”有着深刻的见解。

sentences.english: Conveniently enough, Mr Ban will not be around.
sentences.chinese: 巧的是，潘基文刚好不在。

sentences.english: It so happens that I'm free today.
sentences.chinese: 真是巧极了，正好我今天有空。

sentences.english: Gusteau had no children, and what of the timing of all this?
sentences.chinese: 古斯特没有子嗣这件事怎么会这么巧？

sentences.english: By a strange coincidence we happened to be travelling on the same train.
sentences.chinese: 巧的出奇，我们正好坐同一列火车。

sentences.english: Chocolate and the cocoa beans used to make it were highly prized by the Aztecs.
sentences.chinese: 巧克拉特及其原料可可豆受到阿兹特克人的高度珍视。

sentences.english: Milk Chocolate Product can replace dried whey and artificial flavors.
sentences.chinese: 巧饲粉能代替乳清粉和人工香料。

sentences.english: We have to do two groups, remember, and it looks like we have to interview fifteen for each group.
sentences.chinese: 记住，我们需要做两组调查，好像每组要采访巧个人。

sentences.english: The pigs consuming the Milk Chocolate diets gained faster and more efficiently in the early weeks of the trial.
sentences.chinese: 猪食用巧饲粉饲料在实验的第一周增重更快更有效。

sentences.english: As I said yesterday, smart power requires smart people. We've got the smart people.
sentences.chinese: 就像我昨天所说的一样，巧实力需要聪明的人去掌握。

sentences.english: Funnily enough, money, woman 's birthday is in September of the lunar month.
sentences.chinese: 说来也巧，钱太婆的生日就在农历九月初九。

sentences.english: You get better at this game through practice;
sentences.chinese: 玩这场游戏，多多练习，熟能生巧巧。

sentences.english: Bedroom corner is designed opportunely , small balcony changes teahouse.
sentences.chinese: 居室一隅巧设计，小小阳台变茶室。

definition: too bad/unfortunately/as luck would have it
to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
as it turns out/by lucky coincidence/(of number, time, size etc) just right
by coincidence/it so happened that/fortunately/against expectation
just (in time)/just right/just enough/to happen to/to chance to/by chance/it just so happens that
arriving early can't beat coming at the right time/perfect timing
pinyin: lai2 de5 zao3 bu4 ru2 lai2 de5 qiao3
